comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Charles Mills Galloway (August 15, 1875 - September 3, 1954) of South Carolina was appointed by Woodrow Wilson to head the United States Civil Service Commission on May 22, 1913. I started a Wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_M._Galloway I also have a copy of his death certificate. I will post it to my Flickr account: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/3754391388]

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for finding more info. on Galloway.  We'll add his full name and where he's from next time we update.
